description:
This week, we bring you a tasty young treat named Denny.
This college baseball player was looking to make some extra cash so he could make rent. He said it was because his girlfriend made him buy her an extra special Valentine's Day ring, which cost more than 3 months rent. What a racket! So this stud has decided to be a champ and pull out his thick cock, and stroke it until it spurts all over the place...just for us.
So have fun with Denny as he lounges on the couch with his cock in his hand, cleans off in the shower and then he decides that he wants to unload his balls while he spreads out and gets comfortable on the bed.
title: Denny
